Author: olamidey
Title: 🔥🔥🔥🔥[ANN][New Blockchain technology] - Mammoth platform🔥🔥🔥🔥
Body: This project is going to be one of the most challenging project and if it succeeds it is going to be on of the miracles of cryptocurrency. As we all know nothing is impossible so let's keep our fingers crossed, Mammoth token hopes to serve as a new medium of exchange, it expects to be new money using the peer to peer technology to operate, without any form of central authority or physical bank. Transactions and the distribution of the token will be done by the Mammoth  network.

Author: MammothBlockchain
Title: 🔥🔥🔥🔥[ANN][New Blockchain technology] - Mammoth platform🔥🔥🔥🔥
Body: https://fastpic.co/images/mammothblockchain_logo_ANN.png  ABOUT  The Mammoth is an innovative payment network and a new kind of money. Mammoth uses peer-to-peer technology to operate with no central authority or banks. Managing transactions and the issuing of Mammoth token is carried out collectively by the network.  WEBSITE - https://mammothblockchain.org/ WHITEPAPER - https://mammothblockchain.org/doc/Mammoth_whitepaper_01.pdf GitHub - https://github.com/MammothHub  TWITTER - https://twitter.com/Mammoth25741912 LINKEDIN - https://www.linkedin.com/company/mammothblockchain/ TELEGRAM - https://t.me/MammothPlatform  MMT token is traded on the ForkDelta !!!  https://forkdelta.app/#!/trade/0xeb01fe453348e95e02ec06ec20f0b701971976fc-ETH  Pre-sale MMT token CLOSE Start 1 June 2018 - End 15 June 2018, the MMT tokens will be sold at the lowest price. Become one of the first investors and get the maximum profit. 50 000 MMT = 1 ETH (Total Pre-sale = 150 000 000 MMT)  Mammoth ICO CLOSE Start - 18 June 2018 23:00, END - 29 June 2018 23:00 30 000 MMT = 1 ETH (Total ICO token = 400 000 000 MMT)  MMT TOKEN Token standard: ERC20 Address token: 0xeB01fe453348e95E02ec06ec20F0B701971976FC Token Symbol: MMT Decimals: 18 Total supply: 1 000 000 000 MMT Block Explorer: https://etherscan.io/address/0xeb01fe453348e95e02ec06ec20f0b701971976fc  ROADMAP  https://fastpic.co/images/roadmap6d76f5dff45fa7a3.png  MMT TOKEN GENERATION EVENT In order to further develop and  promote the Mammoth platform, Mammoth will conduct a token generation event that will offer for sale 550,000,000 MMT tokens out of a 1 billion total supply. The remaining will be reserved for  the liquidity pool, bounty programs and referrals.
